title: Animal Crossing New Horizons Island Tour!
description: PLEASE SUBSCRIBE:  GET MY PINK iJUSTINE CABLES HERE:   GET MY EDITING PLUGIN:    MUSIC I USE -   FRIEND ME HERE:        MY NEW PROJECT:   PODCAST:       WHAT I USE TO MAKE VIDEOS    CAMERAS: Sony a7 IV -  Sony a1 -   Sony a7s III -   Insta 360 ONE X3 -  Insta 360 ONE RS -  Insta 360 GO2 -   LENSES: New Sony GM 24-70mm ii -  Older Sony GM 24-70mm -  New Sony Sony 20-70mm -  Sony GM 16-35mm -  Sony GM 50mm -  Sony GM 135mm -  Sony GM 85mm -   AUDIO:  Sennheiser AVX Digital Wireless -  Sony XLR Adapter -  Sony Hot Shoe Shotgun -  Tiny Sony Microphone -  DJI Mics -  Rode Podcaster Pro II -  Podcaster Mic -  Elgato Wave 3 Mic -   DRONES: DJI Mavic 3 -  DJI Mini 3 -  DJI Air 2S -   LIGHTING: Aputure 600d Pro -  Aputure Light Dome II -  Aputure Amaran 200d -  Aputure 35in Light Dome -  Aputure Lantern Softbox -   Sony CF Express A 160g + Card Reader-  Sony CF Express A 800g -     These links are affiliate and by using them youre helping out my channel! Thank you!     BECOME A CHANNEL MEMBER:
transcript: - Hey guys, it's Justine and today, oh my goodness, we're playing Animal Crossing. A lot of you guys said you wanted me to play some gameplay of this. And a lot of you asked what have I been doing in lockdown, in quarantine and this is what I've been doing. I've been playing this game a lot. Although my island doesn't really look like I've been playing it a lot. Like I feel like it should be a little bit better than it is, but I've definitely a wall-mounted tool board, okay that's kinda boring but whatever, I'll take it. I will take every single thing that I can get, but I've been playing this game a lot. I'll show you my house. This is just gonna be a little island tour, show you guys around, give you a little looksy of what I've been doing. It's like, I don't even know, it's actually pretty terrible. I just have a lot of stuff. Before it was even worse. I had so much stuff everywhere that I couldn't actually walk. I mean I have a mixer on the floor, Jenna gave me this really cool radio today. I don't have any songs, no! I need to download some songs from K.K. Slider. I should probably go to my Nook Shop. So I've got like a little fish tank over here this little puffer fish. I've also got a hamster, it's just hanging out. I don't think I have to feed him, but he's been running on this wheel for like four or five days solid. Incense and candles, it's my zen zone. This is my little area where I sit here. I sometimes like to leave my island open so people can come and visit. So I sit here and they know that I'm busy. I'm not sure how they know that I'm busy, they just kinda I guess probably realize it 'cause I'm not doing anything but sitting here. I just started a little garden of some seeds and stuff that I collect from other people's islands. They're not going well cause there's not much there. I also have a little swap meet, which I got inspired by Ed. He has a little swap meet at his where you can leave something and then take something. This is the beginnings of it. I also have to make a custom sign, but I haven't really figured out how to do that yet. I mean I figured it out but I haven't figured out how to make it not look like crap. So I'm gonna do that later. I also have to replant all of these trees because I planted them too close to the edge and they haven't been growing. So that's on the to-do list for today. I've just been doing some fishing. Today I recorded this already, and I realized that the audio wasn't recording cause I haven't done this in so long, and I had never gone into the museum. I've been playing this for weeks and I, actually let me see how long I've been playing it, for eight days. Eight days since lockdown, eight days since my birthday and I've been playing this a lot. But I'd never gone into the museum. I would just go in give Blathers my nonsense and then say, "See you later, I'm outta here." The museum is really crazy. The fact that they built this in one day. I don't think I have any fossils, I don't think I have anything that you're gonna want me to donate. Yeah I didn't think so. This was my favorite part about it. Over here is like the bugs and insects, it's so beautiful. Like what is this? How did you make this in a day Blathers? Look at this big old tree, like this is incredible. You built this in a day, you're a liar. I don't understand. I remember playing this game before and not wanting to give anything to the museum cause I'm like this is my stuff. Back up, don't touch. Cool great chat Blather's. We're gonna go and see the rest of my island. I showed you my house, I showed you sort of the layout, so this is what my map looks like. Oh five, we've got five islanders now. This is my little beach area, this is a money tree that is growing, I can't wait for that. I'm gonna get this snail, I still haven't got a tarantula yet. Okay, oh what did I want to do? I wanted to do something over here Now I don't remember. This is the problem with this game. It's cause I get so sidetracked. Get in there, go in. Oh this is what I wanted. I wanted a K.K. Slider song. Oh it's gonna be in the mail so I'm not gonna have it now. Got to get used to not having things immediately, like groceries.
